long_description: With a long runtime, bright white LED and glow-in-the-dark housing, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day Glo flashlight is an essential item for your emergency kit or to take along backpacking. Glow-in-the-dark housing makes the flashlight simple to find when the power goes out at home or you're returning to your camp in the dark of night. Three D batteries (not included) provide up to 720 hrs. (that's 30 days!) of use on low and 16 hrs. on high and 15 hrs. on SOS strobe. High-quality CREE XPG LED outputs 300 lumens of light on high and 35 lumens on low. Use the powerful SOS strobe to signal for help. Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day Glo flashlight is made from anodized aircraft-grade aluminum that stands up to hard use in the outdoors. Includes a rubberized handle wrap and on/off button for nonslip grip.
short_description: With a long runtime, bright white LED and glow-in-the-dark housing, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day Glo flashlight is an essential item for your emergency kit or to take along backpacking.
